00031     const char* OPTION_TO = "--to";

00034     const char* OPTION_DICT = "--dict";

00040 void printUsage()
00041 {
00042     cerr << "Usages:\t" << OPTION_TO << " hira,kata,half,full,lower,upper [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00043 }
00044 
00048 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00049 {
00050     if(argc < 3)
00051     {
00052         printUsage();
00053         exit(1);
00054     }
00055 
00056     // map from option string to type value
00057     typedef map<string, Analyzer::OptionType> OptionMapT;
00058     OptionMapT optionMap;
00059     optionMap["kata"] = Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA;
00060     optionMap["hira"] = Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA;
00061     optionMap["half"] = Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HALF_WIDTH;
00062     optionMap["full"] = Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_FULL_WIDTH;
00063     optionMap["lower"] = Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_LOWER_CASE;
00064     optionMap["upper"] = Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_UPPER_CASE;
00065 
00066     // option types
00067     vector<Analyzer::OptionType> optionVec;
00068     if(! strcmp(argv[1], OPTION_TO))
00069     {
00070         char* p = strtok(argv[2], ",");
00071         for(; p; p=strtok(0, ","))
00072         {
00073             OptionMapT::const_iterator it = optionMap.find(p);
00074             if(it == optionMap.end())
00075             {
00076                 cerr << "unknown option type: " << p << endl;
00077                 printUsage();
00078                 exit(1);
00079             }
00080             optionVec.push_back(it->second);
00081         }
00082     }
00083     else
00084     {
00085         cerr << "unknown command option: " << argv[1] << endl;
00086         printUsage();
00087         exit(1);
00088     }
00089 
00090     // set dictionary files
00091     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00092     if(argc > 3)
00093     {
00094         if(! strcmp(argv[3], OPTION_DICT))
00095         {
00096             if(argc < 5)
00097             {
00098                 cerr << "no option value: " << argv[3] << endl;
00099                 printUsage();
00100                 exit(1);
00101             }
00102             sysdict = argv[4];
00103         }
00104         else
00105         {
00106             cerr << "unknown command option: " << argv[3] << endl;
00107             printUsage();
00108             exit(1);
00109         }
00110     }
00111     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00112 
00113     // create factory
00114     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00115 
00116     // ensure only one instance exists
00117     assert(factory == JMA_Factory::instance());
00118 
00119     // create analyzer and knowledge
00120     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00121     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00122 
00123     // load dictioanry files
00124     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00125     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00126     {
00127         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00128         exit(1);
00129     }
00130     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00131 
00132     // set knowledge
00133     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00134     {
00135         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00136         exit(1);
00137     }
00138 
00139     // set convert options
00140     cout << "convert option values: ";
00141     for(unsigned int i=0; i<optionVec.size(); ++i)
00142     {
00143         cout << optionVec[i] << " ";
00144         analyzer->setOption(optionVec[i], 1);
00145     }
00146     cout << endl << endl;
00147 
00148     string line;
00149     while(getline(cin, line))
00150     {
00151         cout << analyzer->convertCharacters(line.c_str()) << endl;
00152     }
00153 
00154     delete knowledge;
00155     delete analyzer;
00156 
00157     return 0;
00158 }
